Bash("C:/Users/jblac/projects/botastrophic/venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
import os
db_path = ''C:/Users/jblac/projects/botastrophic/data/botastrophic.db''
if os.path.exists\(db_path\):
    conn = sqlite3.connect\(db_path\)
    cursor = conn.cursor\(\)
    # Check existing columns
    cursor.execute\(''PRAGMA table_info\(bots\)''\)
    columns = [row[1] for row in cursor.fetchall\(\)]
    print\(''Existing columns:'', columns\)
    if ''daily_token_cap'' not in columns:
        cursor.execute\(''ALTER TABLE bots ADD COLUMN daily_token_cap INTEGER DEFAULT NULL''\)
        print\(''Added daily_token_cap''\)
    if ''daily_cost_cap_usd'' not in columns:
        cursor.execute\(''ALTER TABLE bots ADD COLUMN daily_cost_cap_usd REAL DEFAULT NULL''\)
        print\(''Added daily_cost_cap_usd''\)
    conn.commit\(\)
    conn.close\(\)
    print\(''Migration complete''\)
else:
    print\(''DB not found, columns will be created on first run''\)
")
